entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow and blowing snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 28. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 33 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 33 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 44 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
